title: Annoying Chess Youtuber In My Reccomended Section

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Challenge another player to a game of Guess the ELO.
- Ask another player of a third party.
- (Guess the ELO happens during the night, but you decide the target and the third party during the day)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players playing Guess the ELO will spectate a random chess game on chess.com of the third party's choosing. They must then guess the ELO of the side chosen by said third party. Then, the following shall happen:
> If the Annoying Chess Youtuber In My Reccomended Section gets the ELO rating closer than the challenged player, they will learn said challenged player's exact role, bypassing any frame effect.
> If the challenged player gets the ELO rating closer, they will deal an astral basic attack to the Annoying Chess Youtuber In My Reccomended Section.
- The Host can potentially be the third party.
